content.prompt: In contrast to United States policies following the First World War, the United States used its military forces after the Second World War to

choices.label: demand the repayment of outstanding debts by its allies
protect United States borders and make its allies responsible for their own security
occupy its former enemiesâ€™ territory and help them rebuild from the war
ensure that its allies assumed the lead in postwar decision making

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
